details.title: Edge Computing
details.description: I work on our proposed MicroLambda Edge Setup for AMELIA team for Machine learning and Mixed Reality applications.

details.title: Database and Pub-Sub
details.description: I also work on the database setup for Lambda Invocation, efficiency physioLogical siganl data storation, publish-subscribe for computation output

details.title: iOS 360 Gear Manager
details.description: Worked on Gear 360 team to develop iOS App for Samsung 360 degree Camera. Particularly, I was working on the stitching engine and connectivity of 360 Camera

details.title: Merged Cells for Tables
details.description: Added support for spanned cells for tables in OneNote, keeping in mind backwards compatibility. Implemented these capabilities in OneNote web app.

details.title: Realtime Ink
details.description: As a ramp up project, prototyped ink collaboration using SignalR web-sockets. Worked on experimenting load and delay with multiple inputs in realtime.

details.title: Containerization of iOS Apps
details.description: Worked on sand-boxing of enterprise applications (containerization) which enable them to be installed on employee's iOS devices without worrying about security issues. Implemented wrapping of library function calls using swizzling, objective-c backend, linker flags and dynamic library injection.

details.title: Sandboxed Browser App
details.description: Built a demo browser application for iOS. Containerized the app using the custom script, so that it only works for certain urls.
